title: Would You Still Love Me If I Weren’t a VIP? - Novel Updates
tags: Oneshot   Rich to Poor   Secret Crush   Secret Identity   Wealthy Characters
author: 季百威
description:
Jiang He is the VIP member of a certain platform where he enjoys the highest quality of treatment while spending the most money. One day, his financial path is cut off. He can't recharge the money anymore, but he still enjoys the exclusive VIP services.

Jiang He: Is there such a good thing in the world?>
